Are you in the market for a VPS Account, either as an upgrade from your shared hosting service or as a replacement for your current VPS host? Do you tire of resource contention on overcrowded servers, unscheduled interruptions, or unresponsive support? Then you owe it to yourself to try a Clix-Dev package from Breezehost.net -- and for a limited time, when you do treat yourself to a Clix-Dev packages -- you’ll be rewarded with a 40% OFF off of your initial 1 months of service!

**Breezehost.net **is pleased to present our newest promotion, we have special offer with VPS servers located in US Dallas and Netherlands Limited stock so be sure to act fast This will not last long!

Specials Offer below are available in our USA Dallas, Netherlands facilities. You may choose your desired location in the order form. Instant setup. 99.99% Up time Guarantee. We guarantee 30 minute response times via ticket and Live Chat support, you will no longer have to wait for Support as we are here 24x7

Our special offer is you will get **40%OFF** **for one month On our all products+1GB RAM ClixDev-1,2,3**. Limited offer sign up TODAY and **GET 40%OFF** for one month ON OUR Clix-Dev Product. 

> **Please use the Promotion Code:  Clix40%OFF**

**Features:**

Breezehost.net we have put in place unique systems and structures that allow us to give you high quality VPS hosting without the high price.

When you sign up for our VPS hosting, we are very proud to offer you the following exciting services:

• Stable And Reliable Servers Using Newest Technology

• SolusVM VPS Control Panel In the event you need to reinstall, restart, or console your VPS you may do so at your convenience in the SolusVM VPS Control Panel.

• 99.99% Uptime Guarantee ( Our servers are always on, everyday, all day, guaranteed.

• Instant Setup after payment confirmation

• No Contracts In the very rare instance that you would want to host elsewhere you can cancel your account at any time.

• RAID Protected Storage Our servers RAID hard drive technology. This technology enables your sites to be stored on two hard drives at the same time. Should one fail, the other hard drive will continue to serve your sites/applications, and there will zero down time just like nothing even happened.
